pkgmetadata.longdescription: ##########csvalidate##########csvalidate is a minimal library for reading from and writing to csv with anadded layer of validationGet Started###########Installation============As any python package, you can install it via pip:: $ pip install csvalidateHow ot use it ?===============The gist of it is to subclass one of `ValidatedReader` or `ValidatedWriter` andadd a `schema` class attribute that defines validation.Examples can be found in the `examples` directory.
